tweets.text: @saddleblaze @SpacePootler @cricketcarl @Alexlebrit @SchJustina11 @ellielockx @P_DriscollW5W13 @MetCC @EnvAgency @XREaling @CathRosePG @RBourchier @darrenmoore @standardnews Existing roads are discriminatory, not LTNs. LTNs make it easier to catch bus too

urls.title: Precious chalk stream in Bexley gets health boost - Thames21
urls.description: Bexley residents and local wildlife can now enjoy a healthier river Cray where it flows through Foots Cray Meadows, Bexley.Waterways charity Thames21 has carried out restoration work on an 800m stretch of the river

tweets.text: This month we complete our restoration works on the river Cray, #Bexley, in partnership with @LBofBexley @EnovertCT & @EnvAgency. We can't wait to see the positive impacts of rewilding this river, like more plants, birds & fish thriving üêü Read more: https://t.co/x04GRodbUL https://t.co/qdz6Tw2h9J

Our Fisheries Enforcement Support Service and Voluntary Bailiff Service will be delivering Operation Clampdown 9 in partnership with the @EnvAgency during the coarse fish close season that starts this Monday 15th March and runs until 15th June. Read more: https://t.co/mzFL2CT6qM

Phase1 @WildTroutTrust & Kilnsey AC. White Beck #Wharfe protected from livestock so riparian flora can develop + tree planting (thanks @kilnseypark @TCVtweets #IDigTrees).
Phase2 in-channel spawning & fry habitat funded by @EnvAgencyYNE #FIP & WTT's @YorkshireWater TROUT project https://t.co/uwDSw57FWH

tweets.text: @P_DriscollW5W13 @MetCC @EnvAgency @XREaling @saddleblaze @SpacePootler @CathRosePG @RBourchier @darrenmoore @standardnews This is a brilliant scheme: safer roads, less pollution, more walking &cycling, a peaceful school run, and a better chance to social distance during covid. tweets.text:
We cannot fully address the climate emergency without taking into account its disproportionate impact on women and children.

This #IWD2021, @EmmaHowardBoyd, @pow_rebecca and @MarianSpain explain why it's so vital that women's voices are heard.

#TogetherForOurPlanet https://t.co/oUJ5jCI6wT

urls.title: Off the starting blocks for multi-million pound flood scheme
urls.description: Enabling work on a ¬£56m flood alleviation scheme in Rochdale and Littleborough will get underway in the coming weeks.

tweets.text:
Exciting news! Enabling works for the Rochdale & Littleborough #flood scheme are set to get underway 

Once completed, the scheme will help protect around 1,000 properties as well as vital infrastructure üöÑ while also benefiting wildlife üê¶üêû

üëâhttps://t.co/s6XCNnkYU4 https://t.co/3sEFFq7SJn

What‚Äôs the collective term for 5 surface velocity radar gauges?! These are installed at Stoodleigh Gauging Station on the River Exe to improve @EnvAgencySW flow data- helping us reduce flood risk downstream. Perhaps the last project of 20-21! https://t.co/ndPlZnfEu3

Today I‚Äôm amplifying the voices of our fantastic female @EnvAgency operational leaders. They lead our response on the ground across the country at a local level working on our flood & regulation work. 

#ActOnTheGap #TogetherForOurPlanet #ChooseToChallenge https://t.co/P4qXVvCryB
2nd eg of completed work by @CHC_Limited for @EnvAgencyNW is a strengthened wall alongside the river #Wyre #Lancashire https://t.co/eAwJI6l4UW
Just got some pics of recent work completed by @CHC_Limited for @EnvAgencyNW. This one is overflow at #Croston dam as part of what‚Äôs required for #reservoir compliance. https://t.co/LLhIPacqeI
@Mightychub @EnvAgencyMids Thanks Richard. I will pass on this commendation to the team. I can confirm that we currently have officers out on site in #Belper investigating this incident.

@xrunnerwill @EnvAgencySW Interesting install there. Would be good to hear more about this when you can find time for a chat. I assume the site has been gauged plenty over the years and you have a good understanding of the velocity profile?
